payload: Implement auth API endpoints in server.go. Add 3 handlers: (1) handleAuthChallenge - generates crypto random 32-byte hex challenge, stores in sync.Map with 5min TTL, returns JSON {challenge}. (2) handleAuthVerify - accepts {public_key, signature}, looks up challenge, verifies Ed25519 signature, gets/creates user by pubkey, updates last login, generates JWT, returns {token, user_id, expires_at}. (3) handleAuthRefresh - accepts {token}, calls auth.RefreshToken, returns new token. Wire routes: v1.POST /auth/challenge, /auth/verify, /auth/refresh. After implementation, verify with go build ./cmd/dex.
